room.name: Entrance
room.description: You are a Computer Engineer. Try to survive! In front of you stands Ray Decarlo, you must please him. On the group sit sallen and key. A whiteboard sits to DeCarlo's left.

room.name: ece270
room.description: A huge cavern in Witherall surrounds you, with noises echoing all around; this is ECE 270. A state machine sits in the center of the room. The door to the north is wide open.

room.name: ece337
room.description: Fear strikes your very soul in this room. There is an unguarded room to the west, and a door with a lock to the north. The mighty Tim is present, and appears to have a pass for the door.

trigger.print: Lock needs a pass... Tim appears to have one, but maybe there's another one

room.name: ece308
room.description: This is a pleasant place. In front of you sits a relic of the Gang of Four. The only path out is the door from which you entered the room.

room.name: Senior
room.description: You made it a little more I guess

item.name: sallen
item.writing: it hurts your brain to look at

item.writing: this is only a key to DeCarlo's heart

item.writing: looks like it can be used to create a weapon

item.writing: looks like it can be used to open something

trigger.print: The lock drops off and the door opens

attack.print: The mighty Tim has fallen. He relinquishes a pass
